#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	string str;
	getline(cin,str);
	int len = str.length();
	for(int i=0 ; i<len ; i++)
	{
		if( str[i]=='a' || str[i]=='e' || str[i]=='o' ||  str[i]=='i' || str[i]=='u' )
		{
		i=i+2;	
		printf("%c",str[i]);	}
		else	
		printf("%c",str[i]);
	}
	return 0;
}
